member.summary: Specifies the format of the embedded thumbnail.

member.summary: The thumbnail data has an unknown format.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.ThumbnailFormat.Jpeg
member.summary: The thumbnail data is a JPEG stream, presumably compressed.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.ThumbnailFormat.Tiff
member.summary: The thumbnail data is a TIFF stream, presumably uncompressed.

member.summary: The thumbnail data is in the format of Photoshop Image Resource 1036.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpArrayCallbackType.Created
member.summary: List is created. TODO: Read list items from XMP.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpArrayCallbackType.Insert
member.summary: PRE: Item is about to be inserted. TODO: Update the index of all items following itemIndex.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpArrayCallbackType.Set
member.summary: PRE: Item is about to be overwritten (followed by Add). TODO: Update the member status of the item being overwritten.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpArrayCallbackType.Clear
member.summary: PRE: List is about to be cleared. TODO: Update the member status of all items.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpArrayCallbackType.Added
member.summary: POST: Item was added. TODO: Update the member status of the itemValue.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpArrayCallbackType.Removed
member.summary: POST: Item was removed. TODO: Update the member status of the itemValue. Update the index of all items following itemIndex.

member.summary: Gets the preferred prefix for the schema.

member.summary: Contributors to the resource (other than the authors).

member.summary: The extent or scope of the resource.

member.summary: The authors of the resource (listed in order of precedence, if significant).

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Date
member.summary: Date(s) that something interesting happened to the resource.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Description
member.summary: A textual description of the content of the resource. Multiple values may be present for different languages.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Format
member.summary: The file format used when saving the resource. Tools and applications should set this property to the save format of the data. It may include appropriate qualifiers.

member.summary: Unique identifier of the resource.

member.summary: An unordered array specifying the languages used in the resource.

member.summary: Publishers.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Relation
member.summary: Relationships to other documents.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Rights
member.summary: Informal rights statement, selected by language.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Source
member.summary: Unique identifier of the work from which this resource was derived.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Subject
member.summary: An unordered array of descriptive phrases or keywords that specify the topic of the content of the resource.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Title
member.summary: The title of the document, or the name given to the resource. Typically, it will be a name by which the resource is formally known.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.DublinCore.Type
member.summary: A document type; for example, novel, poem, or working paper.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.Photoshop.DateCreated
member.summary: The date the intellectual content of the document was created (rather than the creation date of the physical representation), following IIM conventions. For example, a photo taken during the American Civil War would have a creation date during that epoch (1861-1865) rather than the date the photo was digitized for archiving.

member.name: T:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic
member.summary: XMP Basic Schema

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.#ctor(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.Xmp)
member.summary: Constructs an XmpBasic object.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.Namespace
member.summary: Gets the namespace URI for the schema.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.Advisory
member.summary: An unordered array specifying properties that were edited outside the authoring application. Each item should contain a single namespace and XPath separated by one ASCII space (U+0020).

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.BaseUrl
member.summary: The base URL for relative URLs in the document content. If this document contains Internet links, and those links are relative, they are relative to this base URL. This property provides a standard way for embedded relative URLs to be interpreted by tools. Web authoring tools should set the value based on their notion of where URLs will be interpreted.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.CreateDate
member.summary: The date and time the resource was originally created.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.CreatorTool
member.summary: The name of the first known tool used to create the resource. If history is present in the metadata, this value should be equivalent to that of xmpMM:History's softwareAgent property.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.Identifier
member.summary: An unordered array of text strings that unambiguously identify the resource within a given context. An array item may be qualified with xmpidq:Scheme to denote the formal identification system to which that identifier conforms. NOTE: The dc:identifier property is not used because it lacks a defined scheme qualifier and has been defined in the XMP Specification as a simple (single-valued) property.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.Label
member.summary: A word or short phrase that identifies a document as a member of a user-defined collection. Used to organize documents in a file browser.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.MetadataDate
member.summary: The date and time that any metadata for this resource was last changed. It should be the same as or more recent than xmp:ModifyDate.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.ModifyDate
member.summary: The date and time the resource was last modified. NOTE: The value of this property is not necessarily the same as the files system modification date because it is set before the file is saved.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.Nickname
member.summary: A short informal name for the resource.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.Rating
member.summary: A number that indicates a documents status relative to other documents, used to organize documents in a file browser. Values are user-defined within an applicationdefined range.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpBasic.Thumbnails
member.summary: An alternative array of thumbnail images for a file, which can differ in characteristics such as size or image encoding.

member.summary: Gets the preferred prefix for the struct.

member.summary: The contact information city part.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.ContactInfo.Country
member.summary: The contact information county part.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.ContactInfo.Address
member.summary: The contact information address part. Comprises an optional company name and all required information to locate the building or postbox to which mail should be sent. To that end, the address is a multiline field.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.ContactInfo.PostalCode
member.summary: The contact information part denoting the local postal code.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.ContactInfo.StateOrProvince
member.summary: The contact information part denoting regional information like state or province.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.ContactInfo.EMail
member.summary: The contact information email address part. Multiple email addresses can be given, separated by a comma.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.ContactInfo.Phone
member.summary: The contact information phone number part. Multiple numbers can be given, separated by a comma.

member.name: P:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.ContactInfo.WebUrl
member.summary: The contact information web address part. Multiple addresses can be given, separated by a comma.

member.summary: The image encoding. Defined value: JPEG.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.Xmp.Save
member.summary: Saves the XMP to file.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpFileMode.ReadOnly
member.summary: Reads XMP from file. Note: XMP will not be written back to file, even if changed.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpFileMode.ReadWrite
member.summary: Reads XMP from file, and saves when disposing object.

member.name: F:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.Schemas.XmpFileMode.WriteOnly
member.summary: Creates new XMP. Note: If there already exists XMP in the file it will be overwritten.

member.name: T:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles
member.summary: API for access to the "main" metadata in a file.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor initializes an object that is associated with no file.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.#ctor(System.String,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.FileFormat,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.OpenFlags)
member.summary: This alternate constructor call OpenFile.
member.param: The path for the file.
The format of the file.
A set of option bits describing the desired access.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes all resources allocated by this object.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.OpenFile(System.String,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.FileFormat,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.OpenFlags)
member.summary: Open a file for metadata access.
member.param: The path for the file.
The format of the file.
A set of option bits describing the desired access.
member.returns: Returns true if the file is succesfully opened and attached to a file handler.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.CloseFile(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.CloseFlags)
member.summary: Close an opened file.
member.param: A set of bit flags for optional closing actions.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.GetFileInfo(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.OpenFlags@,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.FileFormat@,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.FormatInfo@)
member.summary: Get basic information about an opened file.
member.param: Returns the flags passed to OpenFile.
Returns the format of the file.
Returns the handler's capability flags.
member.returns: Returns true if a file is opened, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.SetAbortProc(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.AbortDelegate,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Set the callback function used to check for a user signaled abort.
member.param: The callback function used to check for a user signaled abort.
An argument passed to the callback function.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.GetXmp
member.summary: Obtain the XMP.
member.returns: Returns true if the file has XMP, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.GetXmp(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpCore)
member.summary: Obtain the XMP.
member.param: Returns the parsed XMP.
member.returns: Returns true if the file has XMP, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.GetXmp(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpCore,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.PacketInfo)
member.summary: Obtain the XMP.
member.param: Returns the parsed XMP.
Returns the location and form of the raw XMP in the file.
member.returns: Returns true if the file has XMP, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.GetXmp(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpCore,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.PacketInfo,System.String@)
member.summary: Obtain the XMP.
member.param: Returns the parsed XMP.
Returns the location and form of the raw XMP in the file.
Returns the raw XMP packet as stored in the file.
member.returns: Returns true if the file has XMP, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.GetThumbnail(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.ThumbnailInfo@)
member.summary: Obtain the native thumbnail.
member.param: Returns information about a recognized native thumbnail, and some related information about the primary image if appropriate.
member.returns: Returns true if a recognized native thumbnail is present and the thumbnail was cached by OpenFile.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.PutXmp(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpCore)
member.summary: Update the XMP.
member.param: Parsed XMP.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.CanPutXmp(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpCore)
member.summary: Determine if the XMP can be updated.
member.param: Parsed XMP.
member.returns: True if the XMP can be updated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.GetVersionInfo
member.summary: Gets the version information for the XMP Toolkit.
member.returns: The version information for the XMP Toolkit.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize must be called before using XmpFiles.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.Initialize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initialize must be called before using XmpFiles.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.Terminate
member.summary: Terminate may be called when done using XmpFiles. It deallocates global data structures created by Initialize.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpFiles.GetFormatInfo(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.FileFormat,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.FormatInfo@)
member.summary: Determine the supported features for a given file format.
member.param: File format.
Returns the handler flags for the file format.
member.returns: True if format info was retrieved, false otherwise.

member.name: T:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpIterator
member.summary: XMP Toolkit iteration services.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpIterator.#ctor(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpCore,System.String,System.String,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.IteratorMode)
member.summary: Construct an iterator for the properties within an XMP object.
member.param: The XMP object over which to iterate.
Optional schema namespace URI to restrict the iteration. Omitted (visit all schema) by passing null or "".
Optional property name to restrict the iteration. May be an arbitrary path expression. Omitted (visit all properties) by passing 0 or "".
Option flags to control the iteration.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpIterator.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes all resources allocated by this object.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpIterator.Next(System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.PropertyFlags@)
member.summary: Visit the next node in the iteration.
member.param: The schema namespace URI of the current property.
The XPath name of the current property.
The value of the current property.
The flags describing the current property.
member.returns: Returns true if there was another node to visit, false if the iteration is done.

member.name: M:SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.XmpIterator.Skip(SE.Halligang.CsXmpToolkit.IteratorSkipMode)
member.summary: Skip some portion of the remaining iterations.
member.param: Option flags to control the iteration.
